verses.text: \w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Balac: \w Build|strong="H1129"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w as|strong="H6499"\w* many calves, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w same|strong="H2088"\w* number \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w word|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* laid together \w a|strong="H1696"\w* calf \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* upon every \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Balac: \w Stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*, \w until|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* go, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H0194"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* whatsoever \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w command|strong="H1697"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w when|strong="H5927"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w was|strong="H0430"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* speed, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w met|strong="H7136"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w speaking|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* \w erected|strong="H5927"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* laid \w on|strong="H0413"\w* everyone \w a|strong="H5927"\w* calf \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H5927"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Balac, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* shalt thou \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Returning|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* found Balac \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* offering, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* taking \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Balac \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Aram|strong="H0758"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w*: Come, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: \w make|strong="H5375"\w* haste \w and|strong="H3478"\w* detest \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w*, \w whom|strong="H6895"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cursed|strong="H6895"\w*? \w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* means \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* detest \w him|strong="H3068"\w*, \w whom|strong="H6895"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* detesteth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*?

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*. \w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w alone|strong="H0910"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w reckoned|strong="H2803"\w* \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w count|strong="H4487"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* know \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* stock \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w just|strong="H3477"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w last|strong="H0319"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3947"\w* Balac \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w this|strong="H2009"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* thou dost? \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w sent|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: \w and|strong="H3947"\w* thou contrariwise blessest \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Call|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* thing \w else|strong="H3808"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* commandeth?

Balac \w therefore|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Come \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* whence thou mayest \w see|strong="H7200"\w* part \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* canst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*: \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* thence.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w when|strong="H5927"\w* \w he|strong="H4196"\w* \w had|strong="H7704"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* high place, \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w mount|strong="H5927"\w* Phasga, \w Balaam|strong="H0413"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* laying \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w every|strong="H7218"\w* \w one|strong="H7651"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* calf \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*,

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Balac: \w Stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w here|strong="H3541"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* offering \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* go \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w meet|strong="H7136"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w met|strong="H7136"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Balac, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

Returning \w he|strong="H3068"\w* found \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* sacrifice, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* Balac \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* taking \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Stand|strong="H6965"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Balac, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*: \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sephor:

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w lie|strong="H3576"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w changed|strong="H5162"\w*. Hath \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w then|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*? hath \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w*?

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* am \w not|strong="H3808"\w* able \w to|strong="H7725"\w* hinder.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w idol|strong="H0205"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* image \w god|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sound|strong="H8643"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* victory \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, whose strength \w is|strong="H0410"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* rhinoceros.

There \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* soothsaying \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w wrought|strong="H6466"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* itself \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*: \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1571"\w* Balac \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*: \w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Did|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w command|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* Balac \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Come|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; \w if|strong="H0194"\w* peradventure \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* thou mayest \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* thence.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* mount Phogor, \w which|strong="H6465"\w* looketh towards \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H3452"\w*,

\w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Build|strong="H1129"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w as|strong="H6499"\w* many calves, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w same|strong="H2088"\w* number \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*.

Balac \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* laid \w on|strong="H5927"\w* every \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w a|strong="H0834"\w* calf \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*.
